title: FUNKY MOVEMENT bold swash font ID
content:
looking for an id on this bold swash alternate font. anybody know the origin? thanks,  
danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307083449im_/http:/typophile.com/files/funkymovement_5076.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [funkymovement.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307083449/http:/typophile.com/files/funkymovement.png) | 20.41 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Looks like Bookman Swash with a stroke added.

- Lex

...or just the [ITC version](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307083449/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=ITC+Bookman+Swash+Bold&x=0&y=0) wich has a bold weight and that 'O' and 'T'.

- Lex
